components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: On Call Engineers Investigating Intermittent Errors with Lookup API for Reassigned Number Packages.

incident_updates.body: Our monitoring systems detected an issue causing intermittent errors using the Lookup API for Reassigned Number packages, and our engineering team deployed a fix. We are seeing full recovery, and are monitoring to ensure that errors do not return. We expect to provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: ACCOUNT SECURITY - Lookup

incident_updates.body: Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Twilio Lookup V2. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

affected_components.name: ACCOUNT SECURITY - Lookup

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Report Delays to Onvoy Spectrum Mobile Network in the US for a Subset of Shortcodes

incident_updates.body: We have identified that this incident is directly related with Onvoy Spectrum Mobile Network. We are experiencing SMS delivery report delays when sending messages to Onvoy spectrum Mobile network in the US via a subset of short codes. Our engineers are working with our carrier partners to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America

incident_updates.body: We have identified that this incident is directly related with Onvoy Spectrum Mobile Network. incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Twilio is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 09 April 2025 at 20:00 PDT until 01 May 2025 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays or failures delivering SMS and MMS to and from United States and Canada handsets via subset of long codes, short codes and toll free numbers.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

09 April 2025 at 20:00 PDT until 10 April 2025 at 00:00 PDT
16 April 2025 at 20:00 PDT until 17 April 2025 at 00:00 PDT
23 April 2025 at 20:00 PDT until 24 April 2025 at 00:00 PDT
30 April 2025 at 20:00 PDT until 01 May 2025 at 00:00 PDT
